title: Honoring Gary Hudes upon the occasion of his designation as recipient of the Lifetime Achievement Award by the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Gary  Hudes  upon the occasion of his
designation as recipient of the Lifetime Achievement Award by the  Bell-
more Chamber of Commerce

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Gary Hudes of Gennaro Jewelers has given not only of his time
and energies but also of his competence, intelligence and leadership and
consequently has been designated for special recognition; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud  to  honor  Gary  Hudes
upon  the  occasion  of  his  designation  as  recipient of the Lifetime
Achievement Award by the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce to  be  celebrated
at its Annual Installation Dinner on January 29, 2011; and
  WHEREAS,  Gary  Hudes  has been called upon to contribute his time and
talents to countless civic and charitable endeavors and has always given
of himself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS, As a five-term President of the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce,
he has certainly had a profound positive effect upon  both  the  Chamber
and  the  community  as  a  whole; he served as Director of the Bellmore
Village Downtown Revitalization Project and is an original  planner  and
coordinator for the Annual Bellmore Family Street Festival; and
  WHEREAS,  Generously  giving his heart and soul to the Bellmores, Gary
Hudes has also played an important role serving as the Public  Relations
Coordinator  for  the Nassau County Strawberry Festival and volunteering
much of his time to the Bellmore Lions Club; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  his  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive  involvement,  Gary Hudes has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual for the benefit of others which Gary Hudes has displayed  throughout
his life; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body that those who
enhance the well-being and vitality of their community and have shown  a
long  and  sustained  commitment to excellence certainly have earned the
recognition and applause of all the citizens of this great Empire State;
now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Gary  Hudes  of  Gennaro Jewelers upon the occasion of his desig-
nation as recipient of the Lifetime Achievement Award  by  the  Bellmore
Chamber of Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Gary Hudes.
